archimate:BusinessService.name: Customer Product/Service Eligibility
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A customer calls the contact center to find out about deposit investment products, their current product use and eligibility is referenced to identify candidate products for consideration
General comment:
This service domain support business development by maintaining a view of the target product/service coverage for customers, identifying undersold (and oversold) situations to focus sales efforts
Business Purpose : Maintain a profile of the product and services for which the customer is eligible and any specific terms or other applicable considerations (supports relationship development and sales activity)
Пример использования:
Клиент звонит в контактный центр, чтобы узнать о депозитных инвестиционных продуктах, их текущем использовании и праве на использование, чтобы определить продукты-кандидаты для рассмотрения
Общее замечание:
Эта область услуг поддерживает развитие бизнеса, поддерживая вид целевого продукта / покрытия услуг для клиентов, выявляя недопроданные (и перепроданные) ситуации, чтобы сосредоточить усилия продаж
деловая цель : Ведение профиля продукта и услуг, на которые имеет право клиент, и любых конкретных условий или других применимых соображений (поддержка развития отношений и деятельности по продажам)
Customer Product/Service Eligibility This service domain supports business development/customer sales by maintaining a view of the available products/services for which a customer is eligible, including any specific terms and/or constraints that might apply. It also tracks the current 'sold' position for the customer identifying the opportunity to sell additional products/services or highlighting an over-sold position (i.e. where a customer has a product for which they may no longer be eligible).
Detailed Summary This service domain maintains a profile of the products and services for which the customer is eligible and which they currently use/subscribe to. The profile can include specific terms or other considerations that do or would apply. The profile is used to support sales activity in particular
Executive Summary This service domain maintains a profile of the products and services for which the customer is eligible and which they currently use/subscribe to. The profile can include specific terms or other considerations that do or would apply. The profile is used to support sales activity in particular
